ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not(ISCHANGED( GGP_Number__c )),$Profile.Id != '00e30000001YLF7',(or( RecordType.Name='VOC' , RecordType.Name='VOC Read Only' )), (or(Responsiveness_Customer_Expectations__c = '', Responsiveness_Summary__c='')), (or(text( Responsiveness_Customer_Rating__c) ='Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied' , text( Responsiveness_Customer_Rating__c) = 'Red - Very Dissatisfied')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check that Responsiveness Customer Expectations and Responsiveness Summary fields are filled.
